channel.title: How do you change the IP of a client to you IP?
channel.description: I'm trying to get it to where i client connects to my IP, and so that if I put it up for download, other can connect.

item.title: How do you change the IP of a client to you IP?
item.dc:creator: @coder_allter coder allter
item.description:
@coder_allter wrote:

To chang you ip go to your Client notepad and find

setserver

You will see

setserver(“Example.no-ip.biz”, “00000”);

That is were you will be able to chang the ip once you chang it compile and there you go enjoy…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the IP of a client to you IP?
